ways to =

holding cells.  Kn=
owing Blacknightmare's vulnerable state he felt the 
need to check in on he=
r.  He began tediously entering the long 
authorization code to breifly get=

punching it in the door slide open and =
he rushed through. The doors 
automatically closed behind him.

"Is everyon=
e okay in here?"  He inquired, but particularly to 
Blacknightmare.
